nodes.text: The Bruanii sector was a sector located within the Mid Rim, on the border with the Outer Rim adjacent to Javin sector. The Corellian Trade Spine passed through this sector. It was the site of the Mugaari space depot.
The Rebel Alliance cruiser Lulsla was destroyed by Imperial forces while under supply in this sector.
Following the Battle of Endor, the Bruanii sector was among the first sectors to throw off the Empire.
